nodes.text: Mena was a female Human resident of Makeb and one of the few able to operate the Argent Sky Lancers orbital satellites. During the Conquest of Makeb in 3638 BBY, the Hutt Cartel hired the InterStellar Regulators to force Mena, her friend Kai Teyun and the others to turn the lasers to the surface and fire on anything Hutts deemed hostile. Mena refused to cooperate and was killed by the Regular thugs.
